blogPost.excerpt: Learn Stash is a hand-picked personal growth directory featuring the top tools & products categorized by specific goals. We've curated the absolute best self improvement resources to guarantee that your next download or purchase is worth your time & money.
blogPost.body: Learn Stash is a hand-picked personal growth directory featuring the top tools & products categorized by specific goals. We've curated the absolute best self improvement resources to guarantee that your next download or purchase is worth your time & money.
blogPost.title: Learn Stash - Discover the best personal growth tools all in one place 💙
blogPost.author: Tyler Speegle

localize.description: Learn Stash是一个精心挑选的个人成长目录，其中包括按特定目标分类的顶级工具和产品。我们已经策划了绝对最好的自我改进资源，以保证你的下一次下载或购买是值得你的时间和金钱。
localize.tagline: 发现最好的个人成长工具都在一个地方💙。

localize.description: Learn Stash是一個精心挑選的個人成長目錄，其中包括按特定目標分類的頂級工具和產品。我們已經策劃了絕對最好的自我改進資源，以保證你的下一次下載或購買是值得你的時間和金錢。
localize.tagline: 發現最好的個人成長工具都在一個地方💙。

previous.title: Stylelist - Figma plugin for quick creation text and color styles

localize.description: 在Figma中更快、更容易地为您的项目创建文本和颜色样式。
localize.tagline: Figma插件，用于快速创建文本和颜色样式。

next.excerpt: Imitate lets you practice pronunciation with real-life videos from youtube, and lets you listen to your own recordings to have an instant feedback loop.
next.title: Imitate - Learn French pronunciation with real-life videos

localize.description: Imitate可以让你用youtube上的真人视频来练习发音，并让你听自己的录音，有一个即时的反馈循环。
localize.tagline: 通过真人视频学习法语发音。

localize.description: Imitate可以讓你用youtube上的真人視頻來練習發音，並讓你聽自己的錄音，有一個即時的反饋循環。
localize.tagline: 通過真人視頻學習法語發音。
